arts.ttl: Donnarumma Shows Gruesome Picture of Face After Brutal Challenge
arts.sum: The Italian goalkeeper needed 10 stitches after taking a boot to the face in PSG's Ligue 1 clash with Monaco.

arts.sum: Milan Škriniar has been demoted to a backup role at Paris Saint-Germain, with manager Luis Enrique favoring Willian Pacho and Marquinhos as his starting center-backs. It appears the veteran defender could be heading out of the club in the coming weeks. arts.ttl: Man Utd transfer news: Alejandro Garnacho update and 'strong interest' in PSG star
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim is facing a busy January transfer window as he looks to bolster his Manchester United squad for the season ahead after an up-and-down start to his reign, while dealing with the future of Marcus Rashford

arts.ttl: Galatasaray Poised to Edge Juventus for €15M-Rated PSG Veteran Defender
arts.sum: Milan Škriniar has been relegated to a backup role at Paris Saint-Germain, with manager Luis Enrique opting for Willian Pacho and Marquinhos as his starting center-backs. It seems the veteran defender could be on his way out in the coming weeks. arts.ttl: Barcelona Set Ultimatum to €60M-Rated Liverpool, PSG Target Over Contract Extension
arts.sum: In October, SPORT reported that Manchester United, Chelsea, Bayern Munich, and Paris Saint-Germain are all monitoring Barcelona midfielder Frenkie de Jong. While de Jong is committed to staying at Barcelona, PSG’s history of signing players from the Catalan club makes them a possible destination next summer. arts.ttl: Juventus’ Loan Hopes Dash as PSG Want at Least €45M for Man City, West Ham Target
arts.sum: With the January transfer window approaching, speculation about Randal Kolo Muani’s future at Paris Saint-Germain is intensifying, largely due to his limited playing time this season. The situation escalated further on Sunday when the French forward was excluded from PSG’s matchday group against Olympique Lyonnais, raising more questions about his role under Luis Enrique. arts.ttl: Photo: How Gianluigi Donnarumma Looks After Taking Wilfried Singo’s Cleat to Face
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain faced a setback during their match against AS Monaco on Wednesday night when Gianluigi Donnarumma was forced to leave the pitch early in the first half. The incident occurred as Donnarumma came out to challenge Wilfried Singo, who was preparing for a potential shot. arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Man Utd eye move for PSG's Nuno Mendes
arts.sum: Manchester United are reportedly targeting Nuno Mendes to fix their issues at left-back, while Fulham are weighing up a surprise January move for striker Evan Ferguson . The Republic of Ireland international has struggled for game time this season, which has alerted the attention of several Premier League sides ahead of the transfer window opening next month.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich Still Serious Threat to Man City, Man Utd for €80M-Rated PSG Loanee
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain took a short-term approach with Xavi Simons by loaning him to RB Leipzig for another season. However, a more definitive decision regarding his future is anticipated next summer. In September, journalist Christian Falk reported that Manchester City and Liverpool are keeping a close eye on Simons’ situation. arts.ttl: PSG goalkeeper Gianluigi Donnarumma left with gruesome injury from horror challenge
arts.sum: GRAPHIC CONTENT WARNING: Paris Saint-Germain's Gianluigi Donnarumma needed staples in his face after he was caught by Wilfried Singo's studs during a game against Monaco
